title: Hardware Insight Data Scientist
summary: Imagine what you could do here at Apple. Innovation runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts.
description: The core function of this role involves crafting and implementing machine learning models, establishing automated algorithms, and building tools to identify anomalies in metrics related to hardware field performance and product quality. Collaborate with multi-functional teams to establish relationships, see opportunities, develop performance indicators, and communicate complex data analyses, getting results.. Build and refine anomaly detection tools and algorithms, improving our ability to identify and respond earlier to emerging signals in our data. Research and integrate new technologies and methods in data science, data engineering, and data visualization to elevate the technical proficiency and innovation of our team. Construct and maintain dashboards and self-service tools, facilitating effective data analysis and sharing of insights. Handle large, complex data sets and use advanced analytics to tackle challenging problems, enhance Train and mentor junior data scientists in technical skills and best practices.
preferred_qualifications: Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Airflow, generative AI, graph databases a plus. Experience with end-to-end app/asset development using UI packages like plot.ly, Streamlit, React. Experience with LLM + Graph Database construction.
